name: openvpn-admin
description: Your private path to access network resources and services securely: Admin service.
preInstallNotes: We recommend a minimum of 0.01 CPUs and 64 MB of RAM available for the Marathon Service.
postInstallNotes:
OpenVPN DCOS Service has been successfully installed!
See https://github.com/mesosphere/dcos-openvpn on how to create users.
postUninstallNotes:
OpenVPN DCOS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
See https://github.com/mesosphere/dcos-openvpn on how to remove persisted state.
